response: Welcome to our module on scooter ownership made easy. We offer features for customer convenience like home service and seamless charging with a portable charger. Our expanding network of hyperchargers allows you to charge on the go, providing up to 50 kilometers range in just 15 minutes. Enjoy free charging at all hyperchargers for a limited period. Our app enables easy service booking and predictive AI maintenance alerts. With 24/7 roadside assistance, you're always covered. Plus, save significantly on fuel costs with our efficient Ola S1 scooter. Thank you.
